Verses: 1 benyameen, Pelaa Ennum Than Mooththa Kumaaranaiyum, Aspaal Ennum Irandaam Kumaaranaiyum, Agaraak Ennum Moondraam Kumaaranaiyum,
2 nogaa Ennum Naalaam Kumaaranaiyum, Rappaa Ennum Aindhaam Kumaaranaiyum Petraan.
3 pelaavukku Irundha Kumaarar Aadhaar, Keraa, Abiyoodh Enbavargal.
4 abisuvaa, Naamaan, Akovaa,
5 keraa, Seppuppaan, Ooraam Enbavargal Ekoodhin Kumaarar.
6 kebaavin Kudigalukku Mooppaana Thalaivaraayirundhu, Ivargalai Manaagaaththirku Azhaiththukkonduponavargal, Naamaan, Agiyaa, Keraa Enbavargale.
7 keraa Avargalai Ange Azhaiththukkonduponapinbu, Oosaavaiyum, Agiyoodhaiyum Petraan.
8 avargalai Anuppivittapin, Sagaraayeem Movaab Dhesaththile Oogim Paaraal Ennum Than Penjaadhigalidaththile Petra Pillaigalaiththavira,
9 than Penjaadhiyaagiya Odhesaale Yovaabaiyum, Seepeeyaavaiyum, Mesaavaiyum, Malkaamaiyum,
10 eyoosaiyum, Saagiyaavaiyum, Mirmaavaiyum Petraan. Pidhaakkalin Thalaivaraana Ivargal Avanudaiya Kumaarar.
11 oosim Vazhiyaai Avan Apidhoobaiyum Elpaalaiyum Petraan.
12 elpaalin Kumaarar, Eper, Meeshaam, Saamedh; Ivan Onovaiyum Lodhaiyum Adhin Graamangalaiyum Undaakkinavan.
13 pereeyaavum Semaavum Aayalon Kudigaludaiya Pidhaakkalile Thalaivaraayirundhaargal; Ivargal Kaaththin Kudigalai Ottivittaargal
14 agiyo, Saashaag, Eremodh,
15 sepadhiyaa, Aaraadh, Aadher,
16 migaayel, Ispaa, Yogaa Enbavargal Pereeyaavin Kumaarar.
17 sepadhiyaa, Mesullaam, Iski, Eper,
18 ismeraayi, Isliyaa, Yobaab Enbavargal Elpaalin Kumaarar.
19 yaakkim, Sikri, Sapthi,
20 eliyenaai, Sildhaai, Eliyel,
21 adhaayaa, Peraayaa, Simraadh Enbavargal Simiyin Kumaarar.
22 ispaan, Eper, Eliyel,
23 apthon, Sikri, Aanaan,
24 ananiyaa, Elaam, Andhodhiyaa,
25 ipidhiyaa, Penooyel Enbavargal Aashaakkin Kumaarar.
26 samseraai, Segariyaa, Aththaaliyaa,
27 yareshiyaa, Eliyaa, Sikri Enbavargal Eraagaamin Kumaarar.
28 ivargal Thangal Sandhadhigalin Pidhaakkalile Thalaivaraayirundhu, Erusalemile Kudiyirundhaargal.
29 kibiyonile Kudiyirundhavan, Kibiyonin Mooppan; Avan Penjaadhiyinper Maakkaal.
30 avan Mooththa Kumaaran Apthon Enbavan; Matravargal Soor, Kees, Paagaal, Naadhaab,
31 kedhor, Agiyo, Seger Enbavargal.
32 miklodh Simiyaavaip Petraan; Ivargalum Thangal Sagodhararodunkooda Erusalemile Thangal Sagodhararukku Sameebaththil Kudiyirundhaargal.
33 ner Keesaip Petraan; Kees Savulaip Petraan; Savul Yonaththaanaiyum, Malkisoovaavaiyum, Abinadhaabaiyum, Espaalaiyum Petraan.
34 yonaththaanin Kumaaran Meribaal; Meribaal Meegaavaip Petraan.
35 meegaavin Kumaarar, Piththon, Melek, Thareyaa, Aagaas Enbavargal.
36 aagaas Yogadhaavaip Petraan; Yogadhaa Alameththaiyum, Asmaaveththaiyum, Simriyaiyum Petraan; Simri Mosaavaip Petraan.
37 mosaa Piniyaavaip Petraan, Ivan Kumaaran Rappaa; Ivan Kumaaran Eliyaasaa; Ivan Kumaaran Aadhsel.
38 aadhselukku Aarukumaarar Irundhaargal; Avargal Naamangalaavana, Asrikkaam, Pokkuru, Ismavel, Segariyaa, Opadhiyaa, Aanaan; Ivargal Ellaarum Aadhselin Kumaarar.
39 avan Sagodharanaagiya Esekkin Kumaarar, Oolaam Ennum Mooththakumaaranum, Ekoos Ennum Irandaam Kumaaranum, Elibeledh Ennum Moondraam Kumaaranume.

40 oolaamin Kumaarar Paraakkiramasaaligalaana Vilveeraraai Irundhaargal; Avargalukku Anegam Puththirar Powththirar Irundhaargal; Avargal Thogai Nootraimbadhuper; Ivargal Ellaarum Benyameen Puththirar.
